description: This file is a Vitest configuration file for a frontend project using Vite. It merges existing Vite configuration with test-specific settings, including environment setup and test exclusion patterns.

methods.name: mergeConfig
methods.description: Merges multiple configuration objects into one, used to combine the base vite configuration with test-specific settings.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines a configuration object for Vitest or Vite with proper types.
